mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, NICKNAME, MEMBERNUM FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBERNUM, ID, PASSWORD, NAME, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, JOINDATE, CASH, BIRTHDAY, ADDRESS) VALUES(MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone}, SYSDATE, 0, #{birthday}, #{address});
